import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput'; import { Tabs, Tab, Button,Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap/' const returnList = [] const Return = (props) => { const { value: vaccine, bind: bindVaccine, reset: resetVaccine } = useInput(''); const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); const [disabled, setDisabled] = useState(false) const [spin, setSpin] = useState('') const [error,setError]=useState('') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() returnList.push({ "vaccineName": vaccine, "quantityReturned": quantity }) console.log(returnList) resetVaccine() resetQuantity() } const handleApiSubmission = () => ( setSpin('border'), document.getElementById("mySubmitBtn").setAttribute("disabled",""), axios.get("https://dev.hisprwanda.org/").then(res => { document.getElementById("mySubmitBtn").removeAttribute("disabled",""); returnList.splice(0, returnList.length); }).catch(error => { document.getElementById("mySubmitBtn").removeAttribute("disabled",""); setError('Please try again later') setSpin('') }) // setDispensed(true) ) return (
